verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall make a <S%H6381>singular<s%> <S%H5088>vow,<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> shall be for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by your <S%H6187>estimation.<s%>

And your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be of the <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even to <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> even your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> it be a <S%H5347>female,<s%> then your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be from <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even to <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be of the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even to <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be of the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be from <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>above;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it be a <S%H2145>male,<s%> then your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> he be <S%H4134>poorer<s%> than your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> then he shall <S%H5975>present<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> him; <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5381>ability<s%> that <S%H5087>vowed<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6186>value<s%> him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be a <S%H929>beast,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> men <S%H7126>bring<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that any man <S%H5414>gives<s%> of such to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

He shall not <S%H2498>alter<s%> it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4171>change<s%> it, a <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H7451>bad<s%> for a <S%H2896>good:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> he shall at all <S%H4171>change<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> for <S%H929>beast,<s%> then it and the <S%H8545>exchange<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> they do not <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H7133>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then he shall <S%H5975>present<s%> the <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> it, <S%H996>whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad:<s%> as you <S%H6187>value<s%> it, who are the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it be.
But <S%H518>if<s%> he will at all <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof to your <S%H6187>estimation.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>estimate<s%> it, <S%H996>whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad:<s%> as the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>estimate<s%> it, <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he that <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> to it, and it shall be his.

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> some part of a <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> then your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H2233>seed<s%> thereof: an <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be valued at <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> from the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> it shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> to him the <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> <S%H6310><s%> to the <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H3498>remain,<s%> even to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> and it shall be <S%H1639>abated<s%> from your <S%H6187>estimation.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he that <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> will in any wise <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> to it, and it shall be <S%H6966>assured<s%> to him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> he will not <S%H1350>redeem<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H4376>sold<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> it shall not be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

But the <S%H7704>field,<s%> when it <S%H3318>goes<s%> out in the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2764>devoted;<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> thereof shall be the <S%H3548>priest's.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%> which he has <S%H4736>bought,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is not of the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of his <S%H272>possession;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> to him the <S%H4373>worth<s%> of your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> even to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3104>jubilee:<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> as a <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to him of <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> it was <S%H7069>bought,<s%> even to him to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> did belong.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6187>estimations<s%> shall be according to the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%> shall be the <S%H8255>shekel.<s%>

<S%H389>Only<s%> the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> should be the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1069>firstling,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it; <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7716>sheep:<s%> it is the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> then he shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> it according to your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of it <S%H5921>thereto:<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> it be not <S%H1350>redeemed,<s%> then it shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> according to your <S%H6187>estimation.<s%>

<S%H389>Notwithstanding<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2764>devoted<s%> thing, that a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2763>devote<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast,<s%> and of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> or <S%H1350>redeemed:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2764>devoted<s%> thing is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3606>None<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2764>devoted,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H2763>devoted<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> shall be <S%H6299>redeemed;<s%> but shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> whether of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> or of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's:<s%> it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> will at all <S%H1350>redeem<s%> ought of his <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H5921>thereto<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof.

And concerning the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> or of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> even of <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

He shall not <S%H1239>search<s%> <S%H996>whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H4171>change<s%> it: and <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H4171>change<s%> it at all, then both it and the <S%H8545>change<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6944>holy;<s%> it shall not be <S%H1350>redeemed.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
